text: Sir James Kenneth McLay (born 21 February 1945) is a New Zealand politician. He was the Deputy Prime Minister from 15 March to 26 July 1984. McLay was also Leader of the National Party and Leader of the Opposition from 29 November 1984 to 26 March 1986. ==References== Category:1945 births Category:Living people Category:Deputy Prime Ministers of New Zealand Category:Leaders of the Opposition (New Zealand)
title: Jim McLay
